<!-- main text -->
<div style="max-width: 55rem; float:left;">
Join us for the **2024 Immcantation Users Group Meeting** to learn how researchers are applying the [Immcantation framework](http://immcantation.org) for high-throughput bulk and single-cell B cell receptor repertoire analysis.
Submit an abstract to present your own research, or simply join us to learn how others are using [Immcantation](http://immcantation.org) to advance knowledge of adaptive immunity.

The meeting will take place via Zoom on **`r BIG_DAY`, from `r BIG_DAY_TIME`**.
The program consists of seven presentations chosen from submitted abstracts. See [Program](program.html) for details.

Registration is **free**<!-- and will be open until `r REGISTRATION_ENDS`-->. Please see [Registration](registration.html) for details.

</div>
